## Transaction.fromPlainObject() method

Converts a plain object transaction into a Transaction Object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fromPlainObject(plainObjectTransaction: IPlainTransactionObject): Transaction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plainObjectTransaction | [IPlainTransactionObject](./sdk-core.iplaintransactionobject.md) | Raw data of a transaction, usually obtained by calling toPlainObject() |

**Returns:**

[Transaction](./sdk-core.transaction.md)
